author: rgardler
msg: Re-Applying changes I accidentally removed in my last commit.

author: rgardler
msg: Putting a jettyconf.xml file in your document directory will override
the one supplied in the default Forrest context. Also no longer copies
jettyconf.xml to build dir (one more file closer to no copying ;-))

author: brondsem
msg: 'clean' instead of 'clean-site' (works better for forrestbot; clean is a more common target in other ant-based projects).  clean-site kept for backwards compatibility
